system.description: “Every brain’s got a port — some just need a gentle knock.” Your Digital Awareness can now detect cybernetics within individuals.  Spend 2 Hope and make a Spellcasting roll against their Difficulty, to do d10+3 damage
system.effect: Your Digital Awareness can now detect cybernetics within individuals.  Spend 2 Hope and make a Spellcasting roll against their Difficulty, to do d10+3 damage
system.blurb: “Every brain’s got a port — some just need a gentle knock.”
